= **SCP-7785** - ヨコハバさんとヒョロナガさん by [[*user PeppersGhost]]

-----

[[=]]
**[*http://www.scpwiki.com/peppersghost この著者の他の作品]**
[[/=]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:author-label-source end=--]]

= [[image http://scp-jp-storage.wdfiles.com/local--files/file%3A2375337-734-24a9/ScratchedAnomBar.png]]


= [[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2375337-735-ahvj/Longboys1alt.png]]


[[div class="frametop"]]
= [[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2375337-736-c2gl/LongboysFrame3.png]]
[[/div]]


[[div class="frametop-mobile"]]
= [[image http://scp-jp-storage.wdfiles.com/local--files/file%3A2375337-737-5r0e/LongboysFrameMobile.png]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="pome"]]
[[=]]
The number of this SCP
Is Seven Seven Eighty-Five.
Beware! What you’re about to see
Will not be easy to survive.
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
[[=]]
[[size 110%]]
##999|このSCPの番号は##
##999|七千、七百、八十、五。##
##999|ご用心！ これから見るものを##
##999|生き延びるのは難しい。##
[[/size]]
[[/=]]
@@ @@
@@ @@
[[div class="pome"]]
[[=]]
The Euclid designation here
Means much has been misunderstood.
If you knew all there is to fear
You'd use your bed as firewood.
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
[[=]]
[[size 110%]]
##999|さっきのEuclid分類は##
##999|実は誤解もいいところ。##
##999|潜む恐怖を知っていれば##
##999|眠ってなんかいられない。##
[[/size]]
[[/=]]
@@ @@
@@ @@
[[div class="pome"]]
[[=]]
Containing this one, by the way
Is quite a simple thing to do:
Stop reading this and go away.
This poem wasn’t meant for you.
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
[[=]]
[[size 110%]]
##999|ところでこれの収容だけど##
##999|やるべきことはごく単純。##
##999|読むのを止めて立ち去りなさい。##
##999|この詩は君のものじゃない。##
[[/size]]
[[/=]]
@@ @@
@@ @@
= [[image http://scp-jp-storage.wdfiles.com/local--files/file%3A2375337-738-r1l3/barrier.gif width="15%"]]

= [[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2375337-739-9xj5/LongboysPT2small.png]]

= [[image http://scp-jp-storage.wdfiles.com/local--files/file%3A2375337-738-r1l3/barrier.gif width="15%"]]

[[div class="pome"]]
[[=]]
Description: Pale and dressed in black.
Created for a children’s book.
One day they launched a sneak attack
And strung their author from a hook.
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
[[=]]
[[size 110%]]
##999|説明: 顔は蒼白、服は黒。##
##999|童話のために創られた。##
##999|ある日突然奇襲を仕掛け##
##999|作者をフックに吊り下げた。##
[[/size]]
[[/=]]
@@ @@
@@ @@
[[div class="pome"]]
[[=]]
Mister Lengthwise. Mister Longways.
They’re not fiction any longer.
Rhymes are like their doors and hallways.
Readers make them even stronger.
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
[[=]]
[[size 110%]]
##999|ヨコハバさんと、ヒョロナガさん。##
##999|二人はもう作り話じゃない。##
##999|韻は扉と廊下も同然。##
##999|読者が二人を強くする。##
[[/size]]
[[/=]]
@@ @@
@@ @@
= [[image http://scp-jp-storage.wdfiles.com/local--files/file%3A2375337-738-r1l3/barrier.gif width="15%"]]

= [[image http://scp-jp-storage.wdfiles.com/local--files/file%3A2375337-740-j86e/LongboysPT3small.png]]

= [[image http://scp-jp-storage.wdfiles.com/local--files/file%3A2375337-738-r1l3/barrier.gif width="15%"]]

[[div class="pome"]]
[[=]]
On Mister Lengthwise sits a hat:
A porkpie, sharp in shape and style.
It covers up his eyes so that
You only see his hungry smile.
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
[[=]]
[[size 110%]]
##999|ヨコハバさんは頭に帽子。##
##999|立派でおしゃれなポークパイ。##
##999|それで両目が隠れてるから##
##999|見えるのは飢えた笑顔だけ。##
[[/size]]
[[/=]]
@@ @@
@@ @@
[[div class="pome"]]
[[=]]
Lengthwise likes to creep up soft
Along your floor and wall and ceiling.
And if he lifts his hat aloft
His gaze will leave your psyche reeling.
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
[[=]]
[[size 110%]]
##999|ヨコハバさんはそっと忍び寄る。##
##999|床に、壁に、天井沿いに。##
##999|ひょいと帽子を持ち上げりゃ##
##999|彼の視線が心を揺さぶる。##
[[/size]]
[[/=]]
@@ @@
@@ @@
= [[image http://scp-jp-storage.wdfiles.com/local--files/file%3A2375337-738-r1l3/barrier.gif width="15%"]]


= [[image http://scp-jp-storage.wdfiles.com/local--files/file%3A2375337-741-1nkz/LenthwiseUnderbed.png]]


= [[image http://scp-jp-storage.wdfiles.com/local--files/file%3A2375337-738-r1l3/barrier.gif width="15%"]]

[[div class="pome"]]
[[=]]
A peacoat clings to Longways’ frame.
He wheezes since it’s buckled tight.
And since you dared to learn his name
He’ll stand beside your door to-night.
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
[[=]]
[[size 110%]]
##999|ヒョロナガさんはピーコート。##
##999|締め金きつくて、息も絶え絶え。##
##999|君が名前を知ったから##
##999|今夜は扉の横に立つ。##
[[/size]]
[[/=]]
@@ @@
@@ @@
[[div class="pome"]]
[[=]]
But if you see him, try to wait
Before you part your lips to scream
For if you fail and take his bait
You won’t awaken from your dream.
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
[[=]]
[[size 110%]]
##999|彼の姿を見かけても##
##999|悲鳴を上げちゃいけないよ。##
##999|うっかり餌に食いつけば##
##999|二度と夢から目覚めない。##
[[/size]]
[[/=]]
@@ @@
@@ @@
= [[image http://scp-jp-storage.wdfiles.com/local--files/file%3A2375337-738-r1l3/barrier.gif width="15%"]]

= [[image http://scp-jp-storage.wdfiles.com/local--files/file%3A2375337-742-iglr/LongwaysDoorwaysmall.png]]


[[div class="pome"]]
[[=]]
So stay alert when counting sheep
And ‘neath the covers always hide—
The moment you lay down to sleep
You'll find them smiling at your side.
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
[[=]]
[[size 110%]]
##999|緊張緩めず羊を数え##
##999|布団を被って隠れてなさい — ##
##999|眠りに落ちたその瞬間、##
##999|二人は笑顔で横に居る。##
[[/size]]
[[/=]]
